GRCRNE Details: Any development within this area should be assessed in terms of potential impact on GCN. Assessed on type of development and proximity to ponds. Surveys are likley to be required, numerous annecdotal recordsSite: Crews HillCode: GRCRNE10

decision_conditions: The Local Planning Authority, having regard to its own evidence and in assessing the evidence submitted by the applicant, considers that, on the balance of probabilities, the land as outlined in red on the submitted site plan has not been used for residential purposes for a continuous period of 10 years prior to the date of this application and the use is therefore not considered to be lawful under the terms of Section 191 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by Section 10 of the Planning and Compensation Act 1991.
description: Use of land for the stationing of a mobile home for residential purposes.
